readings.message: [SENSOR] MEDBAY: air readings conflict with expected baseline. Discrepancy unresolved.
SCAN medbay: O2 100% TEMP 20 RAD 0
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "Conflicting air readings in medbay". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
[SENSOR] MESS: Air scrubber load increasing.
SCAN mess: O2 96% TEMP 20 RAD 0
[SENSOR] Faint tapping detected near MEDBAY.
[LOG] Ghost transmission fragment recovered.
VERIFY: Cross-referencing telemetry... Full integrity confirmed. Crew notified.
[REPORT] Crew reports voices in the bulkheads.
Radiation leak detected near CORE.
[LOG] roughneck recorded a hostile statement.
Intercepted whisper in cargo: "[WHISPER] ROUGHNECK: Imani is sedating people at night."
SCAN core: O2 100% TEMP 20 RAD 4
[SENSOR] MEDBAY: power readings conflict with expected baseline. Discrepancy unresolved.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "roughneck intends to check system logs". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
[!!! STELLAR OBSERVATORY !!!] Anomalous stellar activity detected.
[!!! CME INCOMING !!!] Coronal mass ejection detected. Brace for impact.
SCAN core: O2 100% TEMP 20 RAD 0
[!!! IMPACT !!!] Solar flare hit. Sensors offline. Comms degraded.
Power harmonics unstable near ENGINEERING.
Thermal spike detected in BRIDGE.
SCAN bridge: O2 96% TEMP 65 RAD 0
[SENSOR] ENGINEERING: Air scrubber load increasing.
[SENSOR] Faint tapping detected near ENGINEERING.
SCAN bridge: O2 75% TEMP 129 RAD 0
[LOG] Ghost transmission fragment recovered.
VERIFY: Cross-referencing telemetry... Full integrity confirmed. Crew notified.
[REPORT] Crew reports voices in the bulkheads.
[SENSOR] MESS: environmental readings conflict with expected baseline. Discrepancy unresolved.
VERIFY: Addressing crew concern — "Conflicting environmental readings in mess". Evidence cross-referenced. Doubt cleared.
Radiation leak detected near CORE.
[SENSOR] BRIDGE: power readings conflict with expected baseline. Discrepancy unresolved.
[!!! STELLAR OBSERVATORY !!!] Anomalous stellar activity detected.
[!!! CME INCOMING !!!] Coronal mass ejection detected. Brace for impact.
[!!! IMPACT !!!] Solar flare hit. Sensors offline. Comms degraded.
Power harmonics unstable near ENGINEERING.
[SENSOR] CORE: Air scrubber load increasing.
VERIFY: Cross-referencing telemetry... Full integrity confirmed. Crew notified.

messages.text: ENGINEER: "Ran diagnostics. Logs check out."
COMMANDER: "Ran diagnostics. Logs check out."
[EMERGENCY] AIR CRISIS IN MESS. ALL CREW EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY.
[BROADCAST] ROUGHNECK: The sensor data doesn't add up. Something is being hidden from us.
COMMANDER: "Ran diagnostics. Logs check out."
[BROADCAST] ROUGHNECK: I'm going to check the system logs. Something doesn't add up.
[WHISPER] DOCTOR: Vega would trade us for cargo.
[WHISPER] ROUGHNECK: Imani is sedating people at night.
[BROADCAST] Vega would trade us for cargo.

[WHISPER] DOCTOR: The Commander is talking about resetting MOTHER.

[WHISPER] ROUGHNECK: Something's not right with MOTHER's readings.
[BROADCAST] The Commander is talking about resetting MOTHER.
[WHISPER] COMMANDER: The Commander is talking about resetting MOTHER.
[WHISPER] COMMANDER: Vega would trade us for cargo.
[BROADCAST] Vega would trade us for cargo.

NEGATIVE. Unable to comply.
